description: Hi! I'm {{name}}, I'm {{age}} years old. I've been working as {{title}} at Trendyol for {{experience}} years. I like researching and learning new things. I like to tell others what I've learned and that's why I keep a blog. When I read monotonous and same content articles, I feel like screaming and I try to write different things to save people from boredom.
